reviews_data.review_text: Very ok coffee. I work in this building for reference, I've had this place quite a few times. I just want a nice medium roast coffee I can drink every day but their black coffee has strange flavors and is extremely expensive for just a regular black coffee. Also they open at 7:30am, which is unusually late for a coffee shop in my opinion.
Great iced soy lattes and staff at this location.  I don't recall the woman's name who helped me, but she was very kind, talkative, and engaged.  Def recommend coming in for a quick sip.
Good vibes. Good coffee. Good cookies as well! Enjoyed my flat white
